differentiators.explanation: Allows organizations to modernize attendance tracking without ripping and replacing existing hardware investments.
evidence: We can integrate the devices you’re already using
partners... help our clients adopt cloud-based time attendance systems without replacing current biometric systems

evidence: Track and manage your full-time, part-time, contract, gig and contingent employees real-time
Employee group-based policies to track contract employees

evidence: ADP SecurTime and ADP Vista Payroll. Best together.
Accurate, secure, real-time attendance, absence and leave data direct to payroll

evidence: Leveraging IMEI number tagging... prevents proxy
Mobile app allows only one person to authenticate themselves using a single device

differentiators.explanation: Integrates health compliance directly into the access/attendance hardware.
evidence: Advanced biometric capabilities such as mask detection, temperature detection and thermal scanning

competitive_advantages: Reduction of time tracking errors by 30%
Ability to handle complex compliance requirements across different geographies and worker types
Real-time visibility into labor costs and overtime before they occur
